bill.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to provide funds to acquire and improve property for Jackson State University, authorize property transfer.
bill.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds For The Purpose Of Acquiring And Improving Property For The Campus Of Jackson State University; To Authorize The Department Of Finance And Administration, Acting On Behalf Of The Board Of Trustees Of State Institutions Of Higher Learning, To Transfer And Convey Certain State-owned Real Property And Any Improvements Thereon Under The Possession And Control Of Jackson State University, Located In The City Of Jackson, Hinds County, Mississippi, To The Jackson State University Development Foundation, Inc.; And For Related Purposes.
